page.title: 10Parish News Letter, Bodenham
page.content:
"Bodenham Christian Fellowship.
Meetings for prayer and Bible study are held in fellowship members' homes each Tuesday at 7.45 p.m. The Ladies' Fellowship will hold their last meeting before the summer break on Wednesday 3rd July at 10 a.m. All ladies whether church or chapel goers will be very welcome. The Young People will have their midweek meeting at the chapel each Thursday at 7.30 p.m. until 18th July.They will not meet during the summer holidays."
"Bodenham Parish Council- Bus Tokens
Bus Tokens will be issued to Senior Citizens on 18th July 1985 at Siward James Centre, from 11.00 to 12 noon. Please bring your pension book and a Â£1."
